journeyIntro.overview: Ghost of Tsushima follows Jin Sakai, a samurai who must abandon his traditional warrior code to save Tsushima Island from Mongol invasion. The trophy list combines story completion, exploration, and combat challenges with no difficulty requirements.
journeyIntro.recommendedApproach: Play through the story while liberating camps and exploring as you go. The Guiding Wind system makes finding collectibles easy. Complete character tales (Norio, Masako, Ishikawa, Yuna) as they become available. Clean up remaining collectibles after the story.
warnings: No missable trophies - everything can be completed after the story
Game-breaking progression bugs occur in ~20% of playthroughs - manual save after every quest recommended
Equip Charm of Inari early to increase supplies found
Can be completed on any difficulty - no difficulty trophies

trophies.name: Living Legend
trophies.description: Obtain all trophies
trophies.guide: Earn all other 51 trophies to unlock the platinum. DLC (Iki Island) trophies are not required.
trophies.walkthrough: Follow the suggested phases below. With no missables and the helpful Guiding Wind, this is a very achievable platinum.

trophies.name: Mono No Aware
trophies.description: Leave the past behind and accept the burden of your new mantle
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks automatically after completing the final tale of the main story.

trophies.name: Helping Sword Hand
trophies.description: Complete all Tales of Tsushima
trophies.guide: Complete all 61 side tales (silver icons on map). Tales become visible after liberating regions and talking to NPCs.
trophies.walkthrough: After liberating Mongol camps, fog clears and tale markers appear. Talk to peasants with speech bubbles to discover more tales. Some tales are locked behind story progression.

trophies.name: The Warrior Monk
trophies.description: Complete all of Norio's Tales
trophies.guide: Complete all 9 tales in Norio's questline. Norio is a warrior monk you meet in Act 2.

trophies.name: The Vengeful Warrior
trophies.description: Complete all of Masako's Tales
trophies.guide: Complete all 9 tales in Lady Masako's questline. Masako is an elderly samurai seeking vengeance for her family.

trophies.name: The Unbending Archer
trophies.description: Complete all of Ishikawa's Tales
trophies.guide: Complete all 9 tales in Sensei Ishikawa's questline. Ishikawa is an archery master hunting his former student.

checklist.label: The Ghost and the Demon Sensei

trophies.name: The Headstrong Thief
trophies.description: Complete all of Yuna's Tales
trophies.guide: Complete all 4 tales in Yuna's questline. Yuna is a thief who helps Jin throughout the story.

trophies.name: Teller of Tales
trophies.description: Complete all of the Mythic Tales
trophies.guide: Complete all 7 Mythic Tales. These unlock powerful techniques and legendary gear.
trophies.walkthrough: Mythic Tales are marked with blue/white icons. Find musicians in villages to start them. Each rewards a unique technique or cosmetic.

checklist.label: The Undying Flame
checklist.notes: Rewards: Way of the Flame technique

trophies.name: Have a Nice Fall
trophies.description: Kill an enemy with fall damage by knocking them off a ledge
trophies.guide: Knock an enemy off a cliff to kill them with fall damage. Easiest with Shoulder Charge or Typhoon Kick skills.
trophies.walkthrough: Purchase Shoulder Charge (Deflection tree) or Typhoon Kick (Evasion tree). Find enemies near cliffs - coastlines and mountain camps work well. Charge into them to push them off.
trophies.farmingTip: Do this before liberating all camps. After 100% liberation, fewer enemies spawn in the world.

trophies.name: Cooper Clan Cosplayer
trophies.description: Dress up as a legendary thief
trophies.guide: Equip the full Sly Cooper outfit - a crossover costume from Sucker Punch's other game series.
trophies.walkthrough: Collect all Sly Cooper costume pieces: Crooked Kama headband (Pillar of Honor), Thief's Wrap mask (merchant), and Gosaku's Armor dyed blue. Or find the specific hidden altar that gives the full outfit.

trophies.name: Master Liberator
trophies.description: Liberate the entirety of Tsushima Island
trophies.guide: Liberate all 56 Mongol-occupied territories across all three regions.
trophies.walkthrough: Clear all Mongol camps, forts, and occupied villages. The map fog clears as you liberate areas, making undiscovered locations easier to find.

trophies.name: Body, Mind, and Spirit
trophies.description: Complete all Hot Springs, Haiku, Inari Shrines, and Bamboo Strikes
trophies.guide: Find and complete all meditation/training activities across Tsushima.
trophies.walkthrough: Use the Guiding Wind to track these collectibles. Hot Springs increase health, Haiku give headbands, Inari Shrines unlock charm slots, and Bamboo Strikes increase Resolve.

trophies.name: Gathering Storm
trophies.description: Recover the katana of clan Sakai
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks during the prologue when Jin recovers his family's sword.

trophies.name: Point of No Return
trophies.description: Break your code to help a new friend
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'The Warrior's Code' tale where Jin first uses dishonorable tactics.

trophies.name: Company of Wolves
trophies.description: Recruit the Straw Hat ronin
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'The Tale of Ryuzo' and recruiting the Straw Hats.

trophies.name: Stoking the Flame
trophies.description: Rescue Taka from Mongol captivity
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'The Broken Blacksmith' tale.

trophies.name: Family Reunion
trophies.description: Free Lord Shimura from the Khan's clutches
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'Shadow of the Samurai' - the finale of Act 1.

trophies.name: Leader of the People
trophies.description: Rally the peasants of Yarikawa
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'The Ghost of Yarikawa' tale.

trophies.name: Birthright
trophies.description: Recover your father's armor
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'Ghosts from the Past' where Jin retrieves the Sakai Clan Armor.

trophies.name: Dying Embers
trophies.description: Eradicate the traitors in the name of a fallen friend
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'A Reckoning in Blood' - the finale of Act 2.

trophies.name: The Ghost
trophies.description: Embrace your new identity
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'From the Darkness' where Jin fully becomes the Ghost.

trophies.name: The Exiled Alliance
trophies.description: Reunite with your allies in the frozen north
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'Wolves at the Gates' in Act 3.

trophies.name: Sovereign End
trophies.description: Confront the Khan
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks after completing 'Eternal Blue Sky' - the final confrontation with Khotun Khan.

trophies.name: Flash of Steel
trophies.description: Defeat 20 enemies with a counterattack after a Perfect Parry
trophies.guide: Kill 20 enemies using Perfect Parry counterattacks. Press L1 just as an attack lands for a Perfect Parry, then immediately attack.
trophies.walkthrough: Practice the timing - press L1 right when an enemy's weapon is about to hit. A successful Perfect Parry staggers the enemy, allowing a free hit. This counts when the follow-up attack kills them.

trophies.name: Witness Protection
trophies.description: Shoot a Terrified enemy with an arrow while they're fleeing
trophies.guide: Kill a fleeing terrified enemy with your bow. Enemies become terrified from Ghost Stance or poison darts.
trophies.walkthrough: Activate Ghost Stance (after 7 kills without taking damage) or use blowgun poison darts. When enemies flee in terror, quickly shoot them with your bow before they escape.

trophies.name: All in the Wrist
trophies.description: Defeat the maximum number of enemies in a single Standoff
trophies.guide: Defeat 5 enemies in a single Standoff. Requires fully upgraded Sakai Clan Armor (+4 bonus) and Standoff skills.
trophies.walkthrough: Upgrade Sakai Clan Armor to max and purchase all Standoff skills in the Samurai tree. Approach a group of 5+ enemies and initiate a Standoff. Win all 5 quick-time events in succession.

trophies.name: Open for Business
trophies.description: Successfully Stagger enemies 50 times
trophies.guide: Stagger 50 enemies by depleting their white stagger bar. Use the correct stance against each enemy type.
trophies.walkthrough: Stone stance is effective against swordsmen, Water against shieldmen, Wind against spearmen, Moon against brutes. Using the right stance depletes the stagger bar faster. This unlocks naturally.

trophies.name: There Can Be Only One
trophies.description: Successfully complete every duel
trophies.guide: Win all 25 duels in the game. Duels occur in story missions, camp liberations, and mythic tales.
trophies.walkthrough: Duels are 1v1 sword fights against named enemies. They appear throughout the story and in some side content. Focus on parrying and counterattacking. All duels are required for 100% anyway.

trophies.name: Haunting Precision
trophies.description: Kill 20 enemies with Ghost Stance strikes
trophies.guide: Kill 20 enemies while Ghost Stance is active. Ghost Stance activates after 7 kills without taking damage.
trophies.walkthrough: Build up to Ghost Stance by killing 7 enemies without getting hit. When activated, you can instantly kill up to 3 enemies. Repeat until you have 20 total Ghost Stance kills.

trophies.name: The Ghost of Legend
trophies.description: Build your Legend to earn the title Ghost of Tsushima
trophies.guide: Reach maximum Legend rank. Unlocks automatically through completing story content and side activities.

trophies.name: Quick Study
trophies.description: Learn the Stone, Water, Wind, and Moon combat stances
trophies.guide: Unlock all 4 combat stances by observing or killing Mongol leaders.
trophies.walkthrough: Each stance requires observing/killing several Mongol leaders (enemies with special icons). Leaders appear in camps, forts, and story missions. You'll unlock all stances naturally by mid-game.

trophies.name: Every Trick in the Book
trophies.description: Acquire all the throwable Ghost Weapon techniques
trophies.guide: Unlock all throwable ghost weapons: Kunai, Smoke Bomb, Sticky Bomb, Wind Chime, and Firecracker.
trophies.walkthrough: Purchase the first tier of each ghost weapon in the Ghost skill tree, plus the Firecracker skill. Requires technique points earned from completing content.

trophies.name: The Perfect Storm
trophies.description: Fully upgrade your sword
trophies.guide: Upgrade the Sakai Katana to maximum level at a blacksmith.
trophies.walkthrough: Collect Supplies, Iron, Steel, and Gold from Mongol camps and the world. Visit a blacksmith and upgrade your sword through all tiers. Supplies are the main bottleneck.

trophies.name: A Charming Man
trophies.description: Equip a charm in all 6 slots
trophies.guide: Equip charms in all 6 charm slots. Unlock slots by completing Inari Shrines.
trophies.walkthrough: You start with 2 charm slots. Complete all 49 Inari Shrines to unlock all 6 slots. Then simply equip any charms you've collected (from shrines, quests, and exploration).

trophies.name: Gifted
trophies.description: Collect 10 gifts
trophies.guide: Collect 10 gift items from altars throughout Tsushima.
trophies.walkthrough: Gifts appear at small altars, often near points of interest. More gifts become available as the story progresses. You'll find plenty while exploring.

trophies.name: Slay
trophies.description: Acquire 30 pieces of Vanity Gear
trophies.guide: Collect 30 vanity items (cosmetics that don't affect gameplay).
trophies.walkthrough: Vanity gear includes sword kits, headbands, hats, masks, and saddles. Found at Pillars of Honor, Haiku locations, merchants, and as quest rewards. Collecting from Pillars of Honor is the fastest method.

trophies.name: Light the Way
trophies.description: Rekindle all the lighthouses of Tsushima
trophies.guide: Light all 8 lighthouses across the island.
trophies.walkthrough: Lighthouses are tall towers along the coast. Climb to the top and interact with the brazier to light them. They're visible from a distance and marked once discovered.

trophies.name: Den of Thieves
trophies.description: Discover Umugi Cove
trophies.guide: Story-related trophy. Unlocks automatically during Act 2 in the 'A Message in Fire' mission.

trophies.name: Favor of the Kami
trophies.description: Find and honor all Shinto Shrines on Tsushima
trophies.guide: Complete all 16 Shinto Shrine platforming challenges.
trophies.walkthrough: Shinto Shrines involve climbing/platforming to reach a shrine at the top. Each rewards a powerful charm. Use Guiding Wind to track them.

trophies.name: Honor the Unseen
trophies.description: Bow to 10 hidden altars across Tsushima
trophies.guide: Find and bow at 10 hidden altars. These are NOT marked on the map.
trophies.walkthrough: Hidden altars are small shrines tucked away in scenic spots. When near one, you'll get a prompt to bow (swipe down on touchpad). Look near cliff edges, waterfalls, and beautiful viewpoints.

trophies.name: Lost and Found
trophies.description: Discover a Pillar of Honor and collect its Sword Kit
trophies.guide: Find any 1 of the 23 Pillars of Honor and collect the sword kit.
trophies.walkthrough: Pillars of Honor are stone monuments scattered across the island. Each contains a sword kit cosmetic. You only need to find one for the trophy.

trophies.name: Monochrome Masters
trophies.description: Purchase an item from the Black and White Dye Merchants
trophies.guide: Buy any item from both the Black Dye Merchant and the White Dye Merchant.
trophies.walkthrough: Find both hidden merchants: Black Dye Merchant is in Umugi Cove (Act 2 area), White Dye Merchant is in a Kamiagata village. Buy any dye from each.

trophies.name: Dirge of the Fallen Forge
trophies.description: Play the Lament of the Storm at a friend's grave
trophies.guide: Collect 5 Singing Crickets to learn the song, then play it at Taka's grave after the story event.
trophies.walkthrough: Singing Crickets are found in cemeteries and near graves (listen for chirping). After collecting 5, you learn 'Lament of the Storm'. After a certain story event, visit Taka's grave and play the song.

trophies.name: A Moment in Time
trophies.description: Personalize a scene in Photo Mode
trophies.guide: Enter Photo Mode and add any personalization element.
trophies.walkthrough: Press right on the d-pad to enter Photo Mode. Press up to access personalization options (particles, weather, time of day, music). Change any setting and the trophy unlocks.

trophies.name: Avid Reader
trophies.description: Collect 20 Records
trophies.guide: Collect 20 of the 40 Record collectibles scattered throughout the world.
trophies.walkthrough: Records are scrolls found in Mongol camps, villages, and points of interest. They provide lore about the invasion. You'll find plenty while liberating camps.

trophies.name: Know Your Enemy
trophies.description: Collect 20 Mongol Artifacts
trophies.guide: Collect 20 of the 50 Mongol Artifact collectibles.
trophies.walkthrough: Mongol Artifacts are found in Mongol camps and tents. They tell the story from the Mongol perspective. You'll collect many while liberating territories.

trophies.name: Hero of the People
trophies.description: Liberate 12 occupied areas in Izuhara
trophies.guide: Liberate 12 of the 24 Mongol-occupied areas in the Izuhara region (Act 1).

trophies.name: A Fight For The Isle
trophies.description: Liberate all occupied areas in Izuhara
trophies.guide: Liberate all 24 Mongol-occupied areas in the Izuhara region.

trophies.name: Good Riddance
trophies.description: Liberate 8 occupied areas in Toyotama
trophies.guide: Liberate 8 of the 17 Mongol-occupied areas in the Toyotama region (Act 2).

trophies.name: Securing Sanctuary
trophies.description: Liberate all occupied areas in Toyotama
trophies.guide: Liberate all 17 Mongol-occupied areas in the Toyotama region.

trophies.name: Mass Eviction
trophies.description: Liberate 7 occupied areas in Kamiagata
trophies.guide: Liberate 7 of the 15 Mongol-occupied areas in the Kamiagata region (Act 3).

trophies.name: A New Safe Haven
trophies.description: Liberate all occupied areas in Kamiagata
trophies.guide: Liberate all 15 Mongol-occupied areas in the Kamiagata region.

suggestedOrder.description: Complete the story and liberate camps as you explore. Start character tales (Masako, Ishikawa, Yuna). Equip Charm of Inari early for bonus supplies.
Continue story and character tales. Meet Norio. Start Mythic Tales for powerful abilities. Get 'Have a Nice Fall' while enemies still spawn.
Complete the main story and all character tales. Finish remaining Mythic Tales.
Liberate all remaining Mongol territories across all three regions.
Use Guiding Wind to find all shrines, hot springs, haiku, bamboo strikes, and Inari shrines.
Complete remaining Tales of Tsushima and miscellaneous trophies.
With everything complete, the platinum is yours!
